name: dbmodel
description: Deploy, load or build script from model of SQL database
author: Jan Prochazka

scripts.dbmodel:load: cross-env DEVMODE=1 node ./bin/dbmodel.js load testdata/db -e postgres@dbgate-plugin-postgres -s localhost -u postgres -p Pwd2020Db -d zradlo
scripts.dbmodel:deploy: cross-env DEVMODE=1 node ./bin/dbmodel.js deploy testdata/db -e postgres@dbgate-plugin-postgres -s localhost -u postgres -p Pwd2020Db -d deployed
scripts.dbmodel:build: cross-env DEVMODE=1 node ./bin/dbmodel.js build testdata/db testdata/db.sql -e postgres@dbgate-plugin-postgres
